data.title: Union County Public Schools
data.text:
Back to School: The first day of school is August 26. Find out everything you need to know (including important calendar dates and school open house information) on our back to school page.

Bond: On November 5, Union County residents will vote on $39,421,448 in school bonds. This bond package will address aging facilities at Parkwood High and East Union Middle. The schools were built in the 1950s and 1960s, and are inadequate for modern-day teaching and learning. Learn more about the 2024 Bond Referendum.

Summer Meals: Free summer meals for all children 18 and younger will be served at several locations throughout the summer.

August 12–23 (Monday–Friday)

11 a.m. to 1 p.m.

Atrium Health Union Women and Children's Center (600 Hospital Drive, Monroe, NC 28112)
